definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
Formosa (from Ilha Formosa, "Beautiful Isle", the name given to Taiwan Island by passing Portuguese mariners in 1544)
Kaohsiung Incident (aka Formosa Incident), a crackdown on pro-democracy demonstrations in Kaohsiung, Taiwan, on 10 December 1979 during Taiwan's martial law period
Brave New World, novel by Aldous Huxley 阿道司·赫胥黎[A1 dao4 si1 · He4 xu1 li2]

sentences.english: They all wore the most expensive clothes and had beautiful, long, curly hair.
sentences.chinese: 她们都穿着最昂贵的衣服，留着长长的美丽的鬈发。

sentences.english: The whole wardrobe door on the door, then the train made a beautiful articles.
sentences.chinese: 有门的整体衣柜，则在趟门上做起了美丽文章。

sentences.english: Edgars says it is beautiful palace - but that “Riga is better”.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加说这是一座美丽的宫殿，但是里加更美丽。

sentences.english: Edgars says it is beautiful palace - but that “Riga is better”.
sentences.chinese: 埃德加说这是一座美丽的宫殿，但是里加更美丽。

sentences.english: You never actually stood there and looked up at that beautiful ceiling.
sentences.chinese: 你从来没有真正地站在那里，看那美丽的天花板。

sentences.english: Where Beauty cannot keep her lustrous eyes.
sentences.chinese: 美丽留不住她明眸的光泽。

sentences.english: A lot of Chinese and foreign tourists to see the tree after hanging its amazing beauty repeatedly.
sentences.chinese: 很多中外游客看到树挂后都连声惊叹其美丽。

sentences.english: A shirt that says "Hawaii is beautiful".
sentences.chinese: 一种上面印着“夏威夷真美丽”的衬衫。

sentences.english: Paul-de-Vence and Gourdon) as “One of the most beautiful villages of France.
sentences.chinese: 这个村庄自夸是“法国最美丽的村庄之一。”

sentences.english: One day he sees a beautiful bell at the top of a door.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他看见一户人家的门头有个很美丽的铃铛。

sentences.english: Lady in the end how to be beautiful like?
sentences.chinese: 女人到底怎么样才算美丽？

sentences.english: Its pale rays fled out on either hand; beautiful but grim was the vision they disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 微弱的光线向两旁流泻而出，照出的景象美丽而阴森。

sentences.english: Africa is maybe the most beautiful continent in the world.
sentences.chinese: 非洲可能是这个世界上最美丽的大陆了。

sentences.english: Qingdao is a beautiful seaside city. It lies in the east of Shandong Province.
sentences.chinese: 青岛是一个美丽的海滨城市，它位于山东省的东部。

sentences.english: Outside the pavilion, a pond and Japanese gardens add to the beauty.
sentences.chinese: 在阁寺外，一座池塘和美丽的日式花园更添其美景。

sentences.english: Lies are like flower in full bloom; they look beautiful but do not last long.
sentences.chinese: 谎话像盛开的鲜花，外表美丽，生命短暂。

definition: tender and beautiful/also written 嬌艷|娇艳
